Ringing in the New Year facing its final nonconference opponent of the regular season the FGCU womens basketball team welcomes Savannah State to Alico Arena at7 p.m.Monday Jan PERIOD  PERIOD
Riding a fourgame win streak the Eagles recently went  in the Hilton Garden Inn FGCU Classic besting Hampton  and UC Riverside  PERIOD
Scoring a combined  points thanks to seven shots from long range Taylor Gradinjan was named the MVP of the tournament while earning a spot on the alltournament team.Leading the team in three pointers made Gradinjans  triples ranks her third amongst Atlantic Sun Conference members PERIOD
Joining Gradinjan on the alltournament team was China Dow who scored a combined26 points and grabbed a total of  rebounds in both of the Eagles matchups PERIOD After her alltournament performance during the Hilton Garden Inn FGCU Classic Dow was named the ASUN Newcomer of the Week PERIOD
With a perfect  record at Alico Arena this season FGCU welcomes a Savannah State side who was bested by No PERIOD  South Carolina in its last contest PERIOD
Facing the Eagles for the first time in program history the Lady Tigers come into the matchup at  PERIOD Savannah State is in the midst of a heavy schedule facing seven teams that appeared in the Big Dance a year ago Seton Hall Alabama State Jacksonville Auburn Washington South Carolina and North CarolinaAT State PERIOD
Facing the Lady Tigers in their final nonconference contest of the regularseason the Eagles will look to extend their win streak to five before they hit the road to face ASUN foe Stetson onSaturday Jan PERIOD  PERIOD
